frontmatter.title: SwiftUI: Two equal width columns
frontmatter.staticPreview: A problem that many people run into after writing enough SwiftUI is how to make it so that two views inside an HStack have equal width, such that if the HStack grows both inner views expand proportionally.
frontmatter.mdxPreview: A problem that many people run into after writing enough SwiftUI is how to make it so that two views inside an `HStack` have equal width, such that if the `HStack` grows both inner views expand proportionally...
